The purpose study test stepped-care approach tailor symptom severity base recent American Society Clinical Oncology guideline reduce emotional distress ( anxiety and/or depressive symptom ) improve secondary outcome ( sleep disturbance , fatigue , fear recurrence , quality life ) rural , post-treatment cancer survivor community oncology setting examine intervention cost . The resultant intervention great potential widespread dissemination since manualized , deliver telephone , comprise module allow customized treatment individual different cancer type .
DOC.brief_title: Stepped-Care Telehealth Distress Rural Cancer Survivors
DOC.criteria: Age ≥18 year Score ≥10 GAD7 and/or score ≥8 PHQ9 , indicate clinically significant anxiety depressive symptom , respectively . Past history treat Stage I , II , III ( newly diagnose recurrent ) 28,29 breast , colorectal , prostate , gynecologic ( include uterine cervical ) cancer nonHodgkin 's lymphoma . 660 month posttreatment ( surgery , chemotherapy , and/or radiation therapy ) cancer . Time frame applies recent completion treatment participant cancer recurrence . It acceptable maintenance hormonal therapy .
